name: Lite Solutions
tag_list: sql-server-training, business-intelligence-training, sql-2008-course, ssas-training, ssrs-training, ssis-training, sql-2008-analysis-services
overview:
Lite Solutions is a specialist SQL and Business Intelligence training provider.

They are a Microsoft Partner in: Learning, Data and Business Intelligence platforms.

Their Microsoft Certified Trainers have over 10 years industry experience as BI consultants providing expertise to many business verticals including but not limited to Retail, Health Service, Legal, Financial and Insurance.

The core mission of Lite Solutions is to provide the highest standard of education in Microsoft Data Warehousing technology. Including: Dimensional Model design, Enterprise ETL, Database and Cube design and transactional database implementation and administration - using Microsoft SQL Server technology.

Lite Solutions invites pre course delegates to share their technical concerns with the consultants to ensure the course content includes coverage of delegate experiences and difficulties. They also provide free after course support to their class delegates.

The classes have a maximum fill rate of 6 delegates per class to ensure vital trainer to delegate responsiveness and a more enjoyable learning experience.
